segments.text: I really should be on my way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , don ’ t go yet . Let ’ s at least have one more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you . I can ’ t .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s too bad that you have to leave so early .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . I had a really good time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for coming ! We should meet again sometime soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would be great ! Actually , can I get your phone number , Ella ? That ’ s assuming you don ’ t mind if I call you sometime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok , got it . I ’ ll call you sometime next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s time to go and I hope we can get together again soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so , too . Bye ! Ben .
segments.speaker: S2
